text: Nǐ shuō:“Yǒu jīng rén a! Nǐmen bù huì yǒu hǎo jiéguǒ, chúfēi nǐmen zūnxíng “tǎo lā tè” hé “yǐn jí lēi”, yǐjí [xiànzài] cóng nǐmen de zhǔ jiàng shì nǐmen de jīngdiǎn [“gǔlánjīng”].” Cóng nǐ de zhǔ jiàng shì nǐ de [jīngdiǎn] bìdìng huì zēngzhǎng tāmen zhōng xǔduō rén de pànnì hé bù xìn, suǒ yǐ, nǐ bùyào wéi bù xìnyǎng de mínzhòng bēishāng.
